
{{alias}}( x, value )
    Fills an input ndarray with a specified value.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: ndarrayLike
        Input ndarray-like object.

    value: any
        Scalar value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var opts = { 'dtype': 'float64' };
    > var x = {{alias:@stdlib/ndarray/zeros}}( [ 2, 2 ], opts );
    > x.get( 0, 0 )
    0.0
    > {{alias}}( x, 10.0 );
    > x.get( 0, 0 )
    10.0

    See Also
    --------
